title: PRESS THE RANKED FORGIVEN BUTTON
body:
So I started my 3rd ranked game today without any troubles in the previous one. Played for 5 min but suddenly dc. Inet still working spotify stream and twitch still working. So restart client not a problem at all but hummm.... can not log in. Go to website... Ok ppl got problems with logging in... so well im fucked? As I understand it right, Im not able to reconnect as I can not login? But I will loose lp because ranked is official working? And leaverbooster will keep an eye on me afterwards probably or? Well that sounds pretty annoying to me, Riot can you act and so smt pls? :(

EDIT: LOVE U RITO <3 grad als ich den post geschrieben habe, wurden Ranglisten deaktiviert, lp und afk sollte daher kein Problem mehr sein. Sieht so aus als wäre die Zeit gekommen Mathe zu lernen ;)

replies.body: Es treten momentan Probleme mit dem Server auf, diskutiere bitte [hier](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/de/c/hilfe-support-de/7EQWlEiz-server-down) weiter.
No, the Servers are just down. This game is never gonna be finished, you won't lose LP (:
